FirstRule.title: Global Protect Connection
FirstRule.failText: You must be connected to the Global Protect VPN.

GP2.title: Valid Operating System
GP2.failText: You must use Windows or Mac operating system.

GP3.title: Antivirus Enabled
GP3.failText: You must turn on your antivirus.

GP4.title: Antivirus Approval
GP4.failText: Your antivirus must be on the following list of approved antivirus'...

GP5.title: Valid Antivirus Definitions
GP5.failText: Your antivirus definitions must be updated within 60 days

GP6.title: Sufficient Amount of RAM
GP6.failText: Your computer must have atleast 8GB of RAM.
